pkgmetadata.longdescription: Penalised Likelihood Estimation of a Covariance Matrix // Penalised likelihood estimation of a covariance matrix via the ridge-regularised covglasso estimator described in Cibinel et al. (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2410.02403. Based on the 'C++' code of the 'R' package 'covglasso' (by Michael Fop, https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3936-2757) and the 'R' code of 'icf' (by Mathias Drton, https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5614-3025) within the 'R' package 'ggm'.
